   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(tls_client_ticket_store_SUITE).
   22: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   23: 
   24: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_internal.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_handshake_1_3.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Callback functions
   30: -export([all/0, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   31: 
   32: %% Testcases
   33: -export([ticket_obfuscated_age/0,
   34:          ticket_obfuscated_age/1,
   35:          ticket_expired/0,
   36:          ticket_expired/1]).
   37: 
   38: -define(TICKET_STORE_SIZE, 2).
   39: -define(LIFETIME, 2). % tickets expire after 2 second
   40: 
   41: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   42: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: all() ->
   45:     [ticket_obfuscated_age, ticket_expired].
   46: 
   47: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config)  ->
   48:     {ok, Pid} = tls_client_ticket_store:start_link(
   49:                   ?TICKET_STORE_SIZE, ?LIFETIME),
   50:     [{server_pid, Pid} | Config].
   51: 
   52: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   53:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
   54:     exit(Pid, normal),
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: ticket_obfuscated_age() ->
   61:     [{doc, "Verify the ticket store computes the obfuscated ticket age correctly"}].
   62: ticket_obfuscated_age(_Config) ->
   63:     TicketAgeAdd = 2900512354,
   64:     Ticket =
   65:         #new_session_ticket{
   66:            ticket_lifetime = ?LIFETIME,
   67:            ticket_age_add = TicketAgeAdd,
   68:            ticket_nonce = <<0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1>>,
   69:            ticket = <<1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1>>,
   70:            extensions = #{early_data => {early_data_indication_nst, 16384}}
   71:         },
   72:     CipherSuite = {Cipher, HashAlgo} = {aes_256_gcm, sha384},
   73:     SNI = "some-test-sni",
   74:     PSK = <<10, 10, 10, 10>>,
   75: 
   76:     ok = tls_client_ticket_store:store_ticket(Ticket, CipherSuite, SNI, PSK),
   77: 
   78:     timer:sleep(100),
   79: 
   80:     {Key, _} = tls_client_ticket_store:find_ticket(self(), [Cipher], [HashAlgo], SNI, undefined),
   81:     [#ticket_data{identity = Identity}] = tls_client_ticket_store:get_tickets(self(), [Key]),
   82:     #psk_identity{obfuscated_ticket_age = ObfAge} = Identity,
   83:     Age = ObfAge - TicketAgeAdd,
   84:     ?CT_LOG("Ticket age: ~p (obfuscated age: ~p, ticket age add: ~p)~n",
   85:            [Age, ObfAge, TicketAgeAdd]),
   86:     true = Age < 1000 andalso Age >= 100.
   87: 
   88: ticket_expired() ->
   89:     [{doc, "Verify the ticket store does not return an expired ticket"}].
   90: ticket_expired(_Config) ->
   91:     TicketAgeAdd = 1234563451,
   92:     Ticket =
   93:         #new_session_ticket{
   94:            ticket_lifetime = ?LIFETIME,
   95:            ticket_age_add = TicketAgeAdd,
   96:            ticket_nonce = <<0,0,0,0,0,0,0,2>>,
   97:            ticket = <<2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2>>,
   98:            extensions = #{early_data => {early_data_indication_nst, 16384}}
   99:         },
  100:     CipherSuite = {Cipher, HashAlgo} = {aes_256_gcm, sha384},
  101:     SNI = "some-test-sni",
  102:     PSK = <<20, 20, 20, 20>>,
  103: 
  104:     ok = tls_client_ticket_store:store_ticket(Ticket, CipherSuite, SNI, PSK),
  105: 
  106:     timer:sleep(?LIFETIME * 1000 + 500),
  107: 
  108:     {undefined, undefined} = tls_client_ticket_store:find_ticket(
  109:                                self(), [Cipher], [HashAlgo], SNI, undefined).
